game.name: Olympic Snow Girl
game.shortDescription: "Olympic Snow Girl" is a choice-driven visual novel game, this story follows fearless female athletes chasing dreams bigger than themselves. Your choice opens different storylines, relationships, endings, and emotional arcs. There is no single champion ending — only the ending that champions you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Olympic Snow Girl" is a choice-driven visual novel game, this story follows fearless female athletes chasing dreams bigger than themselves. Your choice opens different storylines, relationships, endings, and emotional arcs. There is no single champion ending — only the ending that champions you.
